H0.text: What is the second Monday in October called in the USA. Indigenous Peoples' Day

H1.text: What is the second Monday in October called in the USA. Native American Heritage Day

H2.text: What is the second Monday in October called in the USA. Fall Festival Day

H3.text: What is the second Monday in October called in the USA. Colombus day

A4.text: Since 1971, Columbus Day has been observed on the second Monday in October, as commemorated by annual Presidential proclamation noting Columbus' achievements.

A5.text: In 2020, Columbus Day was renamed Italian-American Heritage and Culture Day.

A6.text: Berkeley's Indigenous Peoples Day is an annual celebration, pow wow, and Native American market.

A7.text: The Transform Columbus Day Alliance opposes Columbus Day.
